item.title: Spiritfall for PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, and Switch launches May 9
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/spiritfall-for-ps5-xbox-series-ps4-xbox-one-and-switch-launches-may-9

Gentle Giant will release roguelite action game with platform fighter-inspired combat Spiritfall for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Switch on May 9, the developer announced.

Spiritfall first launched in Early Access for PC via Steam on April 3, 2023, followed by a full release on February 28, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Spiritfall is a fast-paced action roguelite with combat inspired by platform fighters. Slash, smash, launch, and wall-splat a multitude of enemies using an ever-changing arsenal of divine powers.

Key Features

  • A Platform Fighter Roguelike – Spiritfall combines tight Platform Fighter combat, nimble movement, and roguelite mechanics into one! Traverse dangerous regions and unleash deadly combos through a randomly generated map.
  • Divine Synergies Await – The divine spirits offer powerful blessings that enhance your abilities in combat, discover your favorite abilities, and experiment with unique builds.
  • Grow Stronger from Defeat – Death is only a temporary setback, reawaken stronger than before at the Sanctum and continue your adventure. Use the resources you gathered to upgrade your skills, unlock unique powers, and equip mighty weapons.
  • Meet Mysterious Characters – NPCs can be encountered throughout your journey, some will even return to the Sanctum and help you on your quest. Others may not be as friendly…
  • Powered by the Community – New content and features are added regularly as we polish and improve upon the game based on your feedback! Follow the game’s development by joining our Discord server or newsletter.

item.title: Sonic x Shadow Generations for Switch 2 launches June 5
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/sonic-x-shadow-generations-for-switch-2-launches-june-5

  • Switch 2

Another launch title added to the lineup.

The Switch 2 version of Sonic x Shadow Generations will launch on June 5 for $49.99 as a launch title for the platform, SEGA announced.

Sonic X Shadow Generations first launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on October 25, 2024, and has sold over two million copies. The Switch 2 version will feature enhanced graphics over the Switch version.

The game’s description reads, “Play as Shadow in a brand-new story campaign featuring never-before-seen abilities that prove why he’s known as the Ultimate Life Form! Also included is a complete remaster of the highly acclaimed Sonic Generations, a time-traveling adventure featuring a greatest-hits collection of 3D and 2D Sonic stages, now with upgraded visuals and new bonus content.”

item.title: No Sleep For Kaname Date – From AI: The Somnium Files ‘Introduction’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/no-sleep-for-kaname-date-from-ai-the-somnium-files-introduction-trailer

  • PC
  • Switch
  • Switch 2

Latest look at the detective adventure / puzzle game.

Spike Chunsoft has released an introduction trailer for detective adventure / puzzle game No Sleep For Kaname Date – From AI: The Somnium Files, featuring characters and scenes from the game.

Here is an overview of the game, via Spike Chunsoft:

The critically acclaimed detective adventure series AI: The Somnium Files has garnered praise from fans worldwide. A new entry in the series is coming to Nintendo Switch 2, Nintendo Switch, and Steam. The player takes on the role of Kaname Date, the protagonist, and once again teams up with the AI-Ball, Aiba, to tackle a mysterious case and rescue Iris, an internet idol who has been forced to take part in a dangerous escape game. No Sleep For Kaname Date – From AI: The Somnium Files introduces a new gameplay element: “Escape”. As with previous games, in “Investigation,” players will examine crime scenes and listen to testimonies. In “Somnium,” players enter the dream worlds of suspects and key witnesses. In the new “Escape” sections, players will solve puzzles to break out of locked rooms. By moving between these three sections, players can obtain the necessary clues to solve the case.

The Nintendo Switch 2 version features reduced loading times, improved graphics, and support for mouse control.

Read more about the gameplay systems here.

No Sleep For Kaname Date – From AI: The Somnium Files is due out for Switch 2, Switch, and PC via Steam on July 25.
